column5: We've all been there:  Funny clip of a guy at a ball game. http://ca.sports.yahoo.com/mlb/blog/big_league_stew/post/Video-Next-time-he-8217-ll-keep-a-better-grip-?urn=mlb-wp21111
Funny, I have had that look many times...it gets old fast...lol
gotta love how not amused the wife is tho
...and I bet you did a LOT less than drop your child
I know eh, the guy drops his kid to get the stink eye, but fart at the table just once at my house is all it takes...lol
It was the lean and lift that earned "the look".
